titles.title: Nursing Home Fire Safety Act of 2007
A bill to provide loans and grants for fire sprinkler retrofitting in nursing facilities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 6/13/2007--Introduced. Nursing Home Fire Safety Act of 2007 - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish programs of direct loans and grants for retrofitting nursing facilities with automatic fire sprinkler systems. Gives priority to grant applications that demonstrate a need or hardship.
